toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
liquidityFee: CircleSwap platform transaction fee is 0.35%, of which 0.2% will be rewarded to liquidity providers, and the remaining 0.15% will be rewarded to all users who create and join ECircle in the UBI1.0 stage (specific rules will be announced before UBI1.0 goes online).
your_transaction: Your transaction will revert if there is a large,unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.

a_portion_of_each: CircleSwap platform transaction fee is 0.35%, of which 0.2% will be rewarded to liquidity providers, and the remaining 0.15% will be rewarded to all users who create and join ECircle in the UBI1.0 stage.

selectSize: Please select the size of the ECircle you want to create:
payToCreateECircle: You need to pay {{gas}} CIR to create this ECircle.
theAddress: Please enter the ECircle address you want to join:
payToJoin: You need to pay 2 CIR to join this ECircle.
joinTheFollowing: You will Join the following ECircle:
bonus: NCircle Bonus: Initially, the airdrop weight of each address is 1 by default, but each address can get the airdrop bonus by expanding its NCircle. NCircle contains the Parent Block Address(PBA) and Uncle Block Address(UBA). The specific addition method is as follows, Each PBA can add 0.3 airdrop weight to the account, and the maximum added weight is 1.5 :Each UBA can add 0.1 airdrop weight to the account, and the maximum added weight is 2.5;
users: When ECircle users (including users who create and join ECircle) participate in liquidity mining, in addition to gaining their own LPT output, they can also get ECircle bonus. By join ECircle, users can share the liquidity mining income without LPT.The liquidity mining power bonus of the ECircle users is related to his/her own LPT computing power, the LPT computing power of all ECircle members, and the LPT computing power of all users in NCircle.
ecirclereward:
When ECircle users (including users who create and join ECircle) participate in liquidity mining, in addition to gaining their own LPT output, they can also get ECircle bonus. By join ECircle, users can share the liquidity mining income without LPT. 
The liquidity mining power bonus of the ECircle users is related to his/her own LPT computing power, the LPT computing power of all ECircle members, and the LPT computing power of all users in NCircle.
addLiquidityTip: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
removingPollTip: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
toolForFind: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
createNCircleTip: Create your NCircle to generate an invitation link or view your NCircle details.
connectToFind: Connect to a wallet to find pools
selectToFindLiquidity: Select a token to find your liquidity
bestPrice: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.
enterNameECircle: Please enter the name of the ECircle you want to create:

stakingTip:
Stake your LP Tokens to join CircleSwap liquidity mining, and the rewards of liquidity mining will be issued in the form of platform token CIR.
*You need to stake 100HT equivalent LP Tokens to enjoy part of ECircle extra rewards.
